channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL

item.title: Are Marathons and Other Extreme Running Linked to Colon Cancer?
item.description: A small, preliminary study found that marathoners were much more likely to have precancerous growths. Experts aren’t sure why.

item.title: Netanyahu Faces Pressure From Far Right Over New Israel-Hamas Cease-Fire Proposal
item.description: Some members of Israel’s coalition have ruled out a proposed hostage deal with Hamas, but the prime minister has yet to state his position.

item.description: Russia seems unlikely to agree to Western troops in Ukraine as part of any deal to end the war.
